![](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png)![](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png)MORE THAN 40 YEARS OF

EXPERIENCE AND RESULTS


### Engineering

A team of more than 25 technicians specialized in this sector.

### Manufacturing

Laser cutting, bending, machining, manual/robotic welding… most of it is done in our    own facilities.

### Assembly

Assembly team with up to 40 years of experience in the industry.

### Integration

Turnkey projects, we have the human and technological resources to carry out almost any type of handling installation.

### Maintenance

Since its beginnings back in 1985 Gaypasa has been in automotive factories providing   its services in maintenance of installations, acquiring valuable experience.

### Engineering

A team of more than 25 technicians specialized in this sector.

- ### Engineering



A team of more than 25 technicians specialized in this sector.

- ### Manufacturing



Laser cutting, bending, machining, manual/robotic welding… most of it is done in our    own facilities.

- ### Assembly



Assembly team with up to 40 years of experience in the industry.

- ### Integration



Turnkey projects, we have the human and technological resources to carry out almost any type of handling installation.

- ### Maintenance



Since its beginnings back in 1985 Gaypasa has been in automotive factories providing   its services in maintenance of installations, acquiring valuable experience.


**We are at every stage of the product**

At Gaypasa we cover all stages of the product, from its initial conception to the maintenance of installations already in operation. This gives us a competitive advantage by having an integrated system, we control at first hand that everything is carried out according to our quality standards.

## Solutions

## Maintenance

![PAF_2P](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/PAF_2P.jpg)

## PAF (Power & Free) conveyors

Power and free conveyor solutions in different sizes.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/transportadores-paf-power-and-free/ "Transportadores PAF (Power and Free)")

![TAS3p](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/TAS3p-2.jpg)

## Ground conveyors

We have different solutions adapted to the loads and operations to be carried out.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/transportadores-al-suelo/ "Transportadores al suelo")

![1h](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/1h-1.jpg)

## Skid / Skillet Conveyors

Turnkey installations and maintenance modifications of skid and skillet conveyors.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/transportadores-skids-skillets/ "Transportadores skids/skillets")

![EV4](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/EV4-380x271.jpg)

## Overhead EMS

Turnkey installations and circuit modifications.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/electrovias/ "Electrovías")

![PAF_2P](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/PAF_2P.jpg)

## PAF (Power & Free) conveyors

Power and free conveyor solutions in different sizes.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/transportadores-paf-power-and-free/ "Transportadores PAF (Power and Free)")

![TAS3p](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/TAS3p-2.jpg)

## Ground conveyors

We have different solutions adapted to the loads and operations to be carried out.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/transportadores-al-suelo/ "Transportadores al suelo")

![1h](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/1h-1.jpg)

## Skid / Skillet Conveyors

Turnkey installations and maintenance modifications of skid and skillet conveyors.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/transportadores-skids-skillets/ "Transportadores skids/skillets")

![EV4](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/EV4-380x271.jpg)

## Overhead EMS

Turnkey installations and circuit modifications.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/electrovias/ "Electrovías")

## Automotive media

![B01](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/B01-1-380x271.jpg)

## Line edge

We manufacture machines to meet the needs of vehicle parts handling.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/borde-de-linea/ "Borde de línea")

![OLYMPUS DIGITAL CAMERA](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Carro1-380x271.jpg)

## Logistics

Our company has extensive experience in the development of internal logistics equipment and systems.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/logistica/ "Logística")

![M4](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/M4-380x271.jpg)

## Handling

Our presence and experience in automotive factories, has pushed us to start in 2010 a new production line oriented to the handling of components.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/manipulacion/ "Manipulación")

![U5](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/U5-380x271.jpg)

## Tools

We develop and build tools to our own design or to customer standards.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/utillajes-puestos-soldadura/ "Utillajes/Puestos soldadura")

![B01](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/B01-1-380x271.jpg)

## Line edge

We manufacture machines to meet the needs of vehicle parts handling.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/borde-de-linea/ "Borde de línea")

![OLYMPUS DIGITAL CAMERA](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Carro1-380x271.jpg)

## Logistics

Our company has extensive experience in the development of internal logistics equipment and systems.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/logistica/ "Logística")

![M4](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/M4-380x271.jpg)

## Handling

Our presence and experience in automotive factories, has pushed us to start in 2010 a new production line oriented to the handling of components.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/manipulacion/ "Manipulación")

![U5](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/U5-380x271.jpg)

## Tools

We develop and build tools to our own design or to customer standards.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/utillajes-puestos-soldadura/ "Utillajes/Puestos soldadura")

## Containers / Platforms

![Imagen40](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Imagen40-380x271.jpg)

## Trolleys and platforms

These logistic platforms and trolleys are designed for the transport of standard or specific racks, or JIT type.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/plataformas-de-transporte/ "Plataformas de transporte")

![CESTA_ESTANDAR_DEPLOYÉ](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/CESTA_ESTANDAR_DEPLOYE-380x271.png)

## Standard spare parts racks

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/plataformas-de-transporte/ "Plataformas de transporte")

![ESCALERA_01](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/ESCALERA_01-380x271.jpg)

## Components for structures

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/plataformas-de-transporte/ "Plataformas de transporte")

![Imagen4](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Imagen4-380x271.jpg)

## Automated racks

These racks are intended for automatic loading and/or unloading installations and therefore maintain the universality and tolerance between them, due to the manufacturing and testing process.

[More information](https://gaypasa.com/en/automated-racks/ "Contenedores automáticos")

![Imagen16](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Imagen16-380x271.jpg)

## Manual racks

These racks are intended for manual or manipulator loading and/or unloading installations depending on the weight of the part.

[More information](https://gaypasa.com/en/manual-racks/ "Contenedores manuales")

![Imagen30](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Imagen30-380x271.jpg)

## JIT supply racks

These racks are intended for Just In Time (JIT) parts supply, which is why they stand out for their robustness, due to the number of trips between supplier and customer during the useful life of the model for which they are intended.

[More information](https://gaypasa.com/en/jit-supply-racks/ "Contenedores manuales")

![Imagen40](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Imagen40-380x271.jpg)

## Trolleys and platforms

These logistic platforms and trolleys are designed for the transport of standard or specific racks, or JIT type.

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/plataformas-de-transporte/ "Plataformas de transporte")

![CESTA_ESTANDAR_DEPLOYÉ](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/CESTA_ESTANDAR_DEPLOYE-380x271.png)

## Standard spare parts racks

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/plataformas-de-transporte/ "Plataformas de transporte")

![ESCALERA_01](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/ESCALERA_01-380x271.jpg)

## Components for structures

[More information](http://gaypasa.com/plataformas-de-transporte/ "Plataformas de transporte")

![Imagen4](https://gaypasa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Imagen4-380x271.jpg)
